## Last Verse
<!--Put a short poem you created using ChatGPT of 20-30 lines,here!-->
 In the realm of numbers, where patterns reside,
Lies a world of insight, where facts coincide.
Statistics, the language of data profound,
Unveils tales of knowledge, astutely renowned.

With meticulous measures, we gather the truth,
Sampling and surveys, revealing the sleuth.
In each data point, a story to be told,
Hidden in the trends, mysteries unfold.

Regression lines, connecting dots with grace,
Predicting outcomes, with confident embrace.
Correlation whispers, relationships clear,
As variables dance, their secrets appear.

Normal distributions, bell curves so fair,
Dispensing probabilities with utmost care.
Standard deviations, a spread's embrace,
Confidence intervals, framing the space.

Confounding factors, lurking in the maze,
Seeking to distort, creating a haze.
But through careful controls, we discern the lies,
Revealing the essence, where clarity lies.

Hypotheses tested, significance revealed,
Drawing conclusions, as truths are unsealed.
P-values, alphas, decisions to make,
Guiding our judgment, ensuring no mistake.

From means to medians, to modes we confer,
Centrality measured, as the data stir.
Skewness and kurtosis, shapes that they bear,
Defining the distribution, with utmost care.

ANOVA and chi-square, tests of great might,
Uncovering patterns, within plain sight.
Degrees of freedom, freedom to explore,
Unleashing the power, to know even more.

Statistical power, a force to behold,
Determining sample sizes, a story unfolds.
Type I, Type II errors, beware their sting,
Balancing the trade-offs that uncertainty brings.

As statisticians, we strive to decode,
The intricacies of life, in each data node.
To unravel mysteries, with skill and grace,
Transforming numbers into knowledge's embrace.

For in statistics, a science profound,
Lies the beauty of patterns, so perfectly found.
With every calculation, we strive to convey,
The wonders of numbers, in our statistical ballet.
